title: Glass Necklace Around Pig's Neck
alternative_title: 돼지 목에 유리 목걸이 ; Kalung Babi ; Pig Neck Glass Necklace
status: 돼지 목에 유리 목걸이 ; Kalung Babi ; Pig Neck Glass Necklace

Description :
        The meeting between Labricia, a girl about to be sold off in marriage, and the pig who will grant her wish.
